articles.author: Shishir Gupta
articles.title: BRI loses steam, no fresh Chinese investment post-Covid pandemic
articles.description: After Sri Lanka went bankrupt due to economic profligacy on count of white elephant Chinese funded projects, Bangladesh has joined Nepal by saying a big NO to any further loans from China. The two countries are now only interested in grants.  | World News
articles.content:
Nine years after it was launched by President Xi Jinping, the Belt Road Initiative (BRI) appears to have lost steam with virtually no new Chinese investment in third countries post-Covid pandemic.
